github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Allowed types: feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, test.
The scope must be one of: slash, look&feel, apollo, design-system.
If the commit affects two or more design systems, separate scopes with a comma, e.g., fix(look&feel,apollo): ...
For general project changes, use the design-system scope.
The scopes deps, deps-dev, and release are reserved and must NOT be used.
Use imperative mood: 'Add feature' not 'Added feature'.
Keep subject line under 70 characters if possible.
For breaking changes, add a ! after the scope (feat(slash)!: ...) and include a BREAKING CHANGE: section in the footer describing the breaking change.
Do not add a body or footer unless necessary.
feat(slash)!: remove classModifiers with a footer BREAKING CHANGE: ...
